title: Project Hoodie
body:
Hey Riot,

So October is here and I haven't seen anything yet on when the Pre-Ordered PROJECT Hoodies are shipping. Can I get an estimate on when it should be coming? I'm going to the world finals match and would like to have the hoodie with me when I fly out to LA. 

Thank you for your time.

replies.body:
https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=1777497769154952&substory_index=0&id=1557966024441462&__tn__=%2As

I found this on the riot games merchant Facebook page. 

TLDR: pretty much going to be at the warehouse last Thursday, should be shipping after that, so expect to get the hoodie about 1-2 weeks after that date, count in the holidays too.

They said they would keep updates on their Facebook page, so I would check/send there if there are questions.

If you're specifically meaning the PROJECT hoodie from the [PROJECT: Merch Quest](https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/landing/2016/project), it's estimated ship date is sometime in October. This means you may or may not have it for Worlds Finals, depending on the exact ship date and how fast the carrier gets it to you.

I hope this clears this up for you, please let me know if you have any other questions.
October is almost over, is it still gonna ship in October?

We still have a week left in October, so there's plenty of time for it to still ship. Hit us up in a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you have any other questions about this.
It's November and the order still says that it's processing

You should have received an email having you confirm your shipping address and explaining the delay in production due to the hurricane. 

If you didn't, feel free to reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), where one of our merch specialists will be happy to assist you further.

I got this email in the morning 

"Congrats again on completing the PROJECT: Merch Quest! Unfortunately, we are experiencing some production delays due to Hurricane Matthew. Still, we wanted to make sure the address you gave us during the original order is still the right one to ship to. If your address below is correct you don't need to do anything. We'll begin shipping in early November, so expect a shipping confirmation sometime in the next few weeks. 

Please let us know by October 31, 2016 if your address or order needs updating by filling out an address change player support ticket from the link below. It needs to stay in the same country as the original address you provided. Thank you and enjoy your PROJECT: Hoodie."
It would be nice to see an update though besides the standard sometime in October.  Like an update on the order status just simply saying shipped would be nice.
